meanings.definition: A small, usually ornamental case for holding needles, cosmetics, or other small articles.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother keeps her sewing needles in a pretty etui.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new etui to store my lip balm and nail clippers.
meanings.sent3: The tiny etui looked like a miniature treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: Her etui of secrets held more than just needles and thread.
meanings.sent5: The etui sparkled on the vanity, catching the sunlight just right.

meanings.definition: A small, decorative box or case for holding small items.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a beautiful etui for sale.
meanings.sent2: I found a lovely etui to store my earrings and rings.
meanings.sent3: The etui on the shelf seemed to wink at me mischievously.
meanings.sent4: His words were stored in an etui of memories, waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The etui on her dresser was a charming addition to the room.
